_comment.what: Dataset powering the beverage calculator. Prices are typical onboard averages; real package prices are editable in the UI.
how_to_extend: Copy this file, change lineId/text/items/sets/packages for the new cruise line.
Keep `sets` strictly as item IDs. `includes` in packages can stay human-readable bullets for the card.
If a line has different gratuity or tie epsilon, override in `rules`.
Add more items freely; if they belong to a package coverage set, add the item id to the appropriate set.

text.packagesExplHtml:
• Package prices already include gratuity.
  • À-la-carte purchases add 18% gratuity automatically.
  • Deluxe covers everything up to the menu cap (pay the difference above).

prompts.for_chatgpt: Summarize {CRUISE_LINE} 2025 beverage package tiers (names, per-day price range, inclusions/exclusions, caps/limits, venue exceptions) and typical individual drink prices (soda, specialty coffee, milkshake, fresh juice, beer, wine by glass, cocktail, whiskey). Return JSON in the provided schema.
prompts.for_grok: Collect latest menus and 2025 price reports for {CRUISE_LINE}. Confirm dynamic ranges for each package tier and average à-la-carte drink prices. Note ship-class/venue exceptions. Provide short bullet points suitable for the 'includes' arrays.
